title: 2 letters which are U & P .... Could anybody able to help me on this? Your help is very much appreciated...thanks
author: ukurperdana

comments.content: **[Caligra MN](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414163848/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/caligra/)** by N. Glason [Mecanorma Collection, 1991] is close but /U is different

That is IJP where the I and J have been brought close together:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414163848im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IJP_6309.png)

Thanks Michel :)  
I should have noticed that! ;)
Omg....IJ & P...Caligra MN...no wonder i couldnt find that font type.... Thanks to you fvilanakis & Michel Boyer for helping me out....very much appreciated. Cheers
